sections.title: National ID Renewal
sections.text: National ID (ID Number) renewal requires the user to have a valid medical insurance, updated address, and payment of renewal fees. The fee may vary depending on the user's status. Renewal is done inside Absher under Services > My Services > National ID. The system may require updating personal information before allowing payment.

sections.title: Driver License Renewal
sections.text: To renew a Saudi driver license through Absher, the user must pay the associated renewal fee, pass a vision test, and ensure the license is within the eligible renewal period. Some categories require uploading additional documents.

sections.title: Passport Renewal
sections.text: Passport renewal includes providing 2 recent photos, verifying personal data, and confirming biometric information twice. Renewal fees (164 SAR) must be paid before submitting the request.

sections.title: Vehicle Registration (Istimara)
sections.text: Vehicle registration renewal requires valid vehicle inspection, valid insurance, and payment of the Istimara renewal fee through SADAD. After payment, the user can issue the new document through Absher.

sections.title: General Notes
sections.text: Absher services generally require: correct personal data, updated address, valid biometric enrollment, and no outstanding violations. Absher may request extra info depending on service type.
